OOC: Ok sorry i thought is was like a gas realeased...ill repost my
last few...

::Halucigen::
Halucigen is hit with the icy mist and feels weak....his stinger slips
in his weakness and he flies off of Prowl...
He tries to transform but gets stuck halfway between a scorpion and a
vulture...He starts falling...
He sends a meeage to his control bot inside of Prowl ' come save me
bot' hoping ot god that it worked

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: It's not an attack on Prowl, its an attack on the Scorpion. Its
a thin
> blast of gas, whoever it hits, it makes them feel weak, because it
drains
> them for a few seconds, and it makes their body as brittle as glass,
making
> dammage much more effective.
